resolutionMessage.rabbitMQ:
Make sure RabbitMQ server is running with the folowing command in a terminal:
	sudo service rabbitmq-server status
 - if status is enable, check the rabbitMq.url (default :amqp://localhost) in the config file default.json (MARS_sequencer/config directory)
 - else activate the service with the command:
	sudo service rabbitmq-server start.
resolutionMessage.configuration:
Check the file default.json in the directory MARS_sequencer/config.
A copy of a standard config is visible in the file default.save.txt
resolutionMessage.buildProcessor:
Check if there are some errors in the build processor process.
 - if yes fix the errors and run the service again using the command ./run_build_processor.sh.
 - else check the buildProcessor.hostname (default:localhost) and buildProcessor.port (default:8001) in the configuration file default.json in the directory MARS_sequencer/config close this process and run it again using the command ./run_sequencer.sh.
